parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: uuid string identifier for an organization

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Download type of media type:
 * `text` - Raw transcription 
 * `doc` - Generate a .docx file to download 
 * `vtt` / `srt` - Subtitle of the session

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: uuid string identifier for the desired session

parameters.name: transcriberId
parameters.description: string identifier for the desired transcriber profile
